full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GIS SROG GLUD BLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES BRJOD, THAL MO BRDAG ,GLUD RDZAS SOGS MA LUS PA GNOD PA'I PHYOGS SU BSKYAL LO, ,BZLOG PA'I 'TSAMS BCOD BYED CING RJES CHO GA DKYUS BZHIN BYA, ,THABS DANG RTEN 'BREL LA RTEN PA'I, GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG GLUD SBYIN 'DI, KOO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, ,RANG GI'I NYE 'KHOR SLON BU NI, BLO LDAN RIGS GROL LA SOGS PAS, ,BSKUL PHYIR 'DOD LTAR CHOS RJE YI, ,THA SHAL BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, ,SNGON MING SE BRE'I SGRA DBYANGS KYIS, ,LEGS BSHAD BCOM CHUD 'DI SGRAD PA'I, DGE LEGS MA GLUD SEMS CAN RNAMS, ,BLO BUR RKYEN DANG 'BRAL GYUR CIG , ,,'DI LA MKHAS RNAMS THUGS LA KHREL, BKRA SHIS DPAL BAR RGYAN DU BYON, ,'PHRAL DU BGYIS PAI YI GE PA NI AER KHE PI LEG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
